articles.title: 2019 video shows Rep. Greene telling people to flood the Capitol
articles.description: CNN's Erin Burnett takes a look at Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene's (R-GA) conspiracy theories and how some House Republicans remain silent about her, but publicly bash Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) after she voted to impeach President Trump.

articles.author: Allison Morrow, CNN Business
articles.title: A surprise announcement in Amazon's blockbuster earnings
articles.description: Today in business news: Jeff Bezos steps down as Amazon CEO, GameStop stock plummets and these robots can jump. Let's get into it.

articles.author: By Rebecca Cairns, CNN
articles.title: World's tallest swing ride now open in Dubai
articles.description: Adrenaline junkies have a new item for their bucket list: the Bollywood Skyflyer.
articles.content:
At 460 feet (140 meters) tall -- the same height as the Great Pyramid of Giza -- the new sky-high ride edges the previous record-holder by just 10 feet.

articles.description: QAnon expert Kevin Roose explains how deeply affiliated with QAnon Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) is. Anderson Cooper Full Circle airs Monday, Tuesday and Friday at 6p E.T.

articles.author: Katie Hunt, CNN
articles.title: These dinosaurs may have used their frills to flirt
articles.description: The large frill that skirts the skull of the Protoceratops was likely used to signal to prospective mates -- rather than for defense or heat regulation.

articles.title: How a group of women across the US is staying connected
articles.description: A group of women from across the country have found a way to beat pandemic isolation, by hosting group zoom painting events. Anderson Cooper Full Circle airs Monday, Tuesday and Friday at 6p E.T.

articles.title: Should Republicans disband the GOP?
articles.description: The dominant storyline in American politics at the moment is the ongoing battle between the establishment wing and the Trump wing of the Republican Party.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.title: A famed private investigator died after an attempted robbery. He cracked his own case, says DA
articles.description: Two men could face murder charges in connection with the death of famed private investigator Jack Palladino, who authorities say may have helped solve his own case.

articles.title: See what GOP lawmakers are saying about Marjorie Taylor Greene
